content:
SyncFromAllServersEvent Enum

Definition

Used in the SyncUpdateCallback delegate to specify the type of synchronization event.

In this Article

public enum SyncFromAllServersEvent
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
SyncFromAllServersEvent

Fields

Error

An error occurred.
Finished

The entire replication process has completed.
SyncCompleted

Synchronization of two servers has just completed.
SyncStarted

Synchronization of two servers has started.
